Event_Description: Bottoms is prevailingly sedimentary, ranging from mud to fine sand. Ravenna harbour is structured as a major ?canal? port extending for 11 km from the centre of Ravenna to the tourist seacoast. The canal is directly connected to the surrounding lagoons: Piomboni (3 km2 - south of the canal port) and Pialassa Baiona (10 km2 - north of the canal port).
soft sediment, connected to coastal lagoons
